alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 3:30AM EST until February 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate snow and considerable blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Additional snow accumulation of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Luce County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 AM EST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel with considerable blowing and drifting of snow across highways. Occasional whiteout conditions are possible. Wind chills as low as 10 to 15 below are expected this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
